attributes.title: Ruined my appetite🤢🤢
attributes.review: I was literally eating and as soon as I opened the app it made me throw up all over the floor.😍🦋

This app is just disgusting it’s horrible and don’t show good anything ugh don’t get this app

attributes.title: Outraged!
attributes.review: i opened the app to see a Cheeto puff on my screen! My eyes are burning! This app is retarded and stupid just like the president, he is a disgrace to the world

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: I thought this app was a joke! Very unfortunate to see. Bad app, disappointed.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this is a horrible app,  don’t recommend, I also don’t recommend supporting this guy , he’s absolutely DISGUSTING, 😜🧚🏽✨

attributes.title: smells bad
attributes.review: I am a humble Christian 😌 and my fellow Christian friends recommend this app because of its delectable smell, I am mad to announce that it DOES NOT SMELL GOOD I repeat IT DOES NOT SMELL GOOD 😡😡🤬🤬 I cant believe I’ve been duped

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: Ya I tried to make it work and be nice and not racist and homophobic but ya know it didn’t work out
